page.title: 06FLEETLANDS
page.content: THE ROYAL NAVAL AIRCRAFT FLEETLANDS IS SITED ON ABOUT 150 ACRES OF LAND. IT COMPRISES 13 MAJOR WORKSHOPS PLUS OFFICES AND OTHER BUILDINGS. IT HAS ACCOMMODATION FOR SIXTY HELICOPTERS UNDERGOING MAJOR REPAIR OR OVERHAUL. THERE IS STORAGE SPACE FORA NUMBER OF RESERVE AIRCRAFT. THE WORKFORCE IS HEADED BY A ROYAL NAVAL CAPTAIN (E). THE WORKFORCE IS MADE UP OF 14 UNIFORMED OFFICERS, 381 NON INDUSTRIAL CIVILIANS AND 919 INDUSTRIAL WORKERS INCLUDING 394 CRAFTSMEN, 37 SKILLED LABOURERS, 173 APPRENTICES. FLEETLANDS IS BEING EXPANDED AND WILL SOON BE THE NUMBER ONE HELICOPTER FACILITY IN EUROPE. CURRENTLY IT DEALS WITH APPROXIMATELY 800 AIRCRAFT, 700 ENGINES AND 10,000 AIRCRAAFT COMPONENTS PER YEAR AT THE COST OF 620,000 DIRECT MAN HOURS OF LABOUR.
